Include dependency graph for drvElectronAnalyserRegistrar.c:

Functions

 epicsExportRegistrar (electronAnalyserRegister)

Detailed Description

Register and Exporting the configuration functions to the ioc shell.

This is the EPICS dependent code for the driver for a electronAnalyser detector. By making this separate file for the EPICS dependent code the driver itself only needs libCom from EPICS for OS-independence.

Author: Fajin Yuan

Created: 11/02/2010
